mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT wh.wh_id id, wh.wh_name name FROM base_warehouse wh LEFT JOIN prd_invent_mas mas ON wh.wh_id = mas.wh_id LEFT JOIN t_goods goods ON goods.id = mas.item_id LEFT JOIN t_member member ON goods.shop_id = member.own_shopid WHERE member.id = #{memberId} AND wh.wh_state = 1

SELECT DISTINCT brand.band_id id, brand.band_name name FROM crm_cust_band brand LEFT JOIN t_goods goods ON goods.brand_id = brand.band_id LEFT JOIN t_member member ON goods.shop_id = member.own_shopid WHERE member.id = #{memberId} AND brand.band_state = 1

SELECT DISTINCT list.list_id id, list.list_name name FROM crm_prd_list list LEFT JOIN t_goods goods ON goods.list_id = list.list_id LEFT JOIN t_member member ON goods.shop_id = member.own_shopid WHERE member.id = #{memberId} AND list.list_state = 1

SELECT DISTINCT model.model_id id, model.model_name name FROM crm_prd_model model LEFT JOIN t_goods goods ON goods.model_id = model.model_id LEFT JOIN t_member member ON goods.shop_id = member.own_shopid WHERE member.id = #{memberId} AND model.model_state = 1

SELECT DISTINCT cat.cat_id id, cat.cat_name name FROM crm_prd_cat cat LEFT JOIN t_goods_cat gcat ON cat.cat_id = gcat.cat_id LEFT JOIN t_goods goods ON goods.id = gcat.goods_id LEFT JOIN t_member member ON goods.shop_id = member.own_shopid WHERE member.id = #{memberId} AND cat.cat_state = 1

SELECT DISTINCT level.level_id levelId, level.level_name agentLevel FROM crm_cust_level level LEFT JOIN t_agent_fac fac ON level.level_id = fac.level_id LEFT JOIN t_member member ON fac.sys_id = member.own_shopid WHERE level.sys_id in (select own_shopid from t_member where id=#{memberId}) AND level.level_state = 1
